Reviews.Title: ““…hotel with the worse service ever….””

Reviews.Content: stay weeks frank hotel worse service everand travel lot sort bb 5 stars hotel hotel worse service wonder belong western talking reception doesn’t try look talked arrogantly doing rude especially hotel business personal opinion there’s family spirit hotel refuse answer call 5 calls i’m angry desk check customer i’m wondering didn’t answer internet slow complaint location wise near airport airport provide shuttle service advance rome challenge bus running 630am 8pm nearest metro station bus journey 45 minutes coming hotel station 730pm wouldn’t miss bus clean tidy furniture stuff garden beautiful maintained
